summary: Header and footer components were updated to reference the new logo path and use non-stretching image styles, but the new logo asset file itself was not added under frontend/public/assets/generated/. The diff also includes additional footer/header functionality not requested in REQ-6.

missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files (Added: 0), so the required new image asset is not present in the change set.
